post.author: thomas lee
post.content:
Jan : My personal greeting of year 2003 to each Comm1 member Starting of personal reassessment workshop
Feb : Lunar New Year Gathering Woo Ju 100 day old Family Party Valentine’s day - Flower time
Mar : Discuss future of Comm One Are we satisfied with one we have ? Is time to think about what the future hold ? St. Patrick Run My wife birthday
Apr : Good Friday – Am I attending weekly mass ?
May to Aug : As many as Comm One picnics possible As many as organized run participation possible One bicycle trip to northern Ontario (2 to 3 days) : looking for participants
Sep : Full Moon Festival gathering
Oct : Autumn Scenery picnic
Nov : Woo Ju 1 year Birthday My Birthday One of 10000 participants of Toronto annual Marathon
Dec : Anabel’s Birthday Comm One X-MAS or New Year Eve party
Regular Activities - daily exercise - weekly group run upto 20 km after summer - family picture taken quarterly basis - write Baby journal and my memoir - Two Community center courses - Read a book for a month - Write daily to do list
post.title: My Personal Year Plan : Jan 2nd, 2003
